name: dapp
description: [Download](https://nodejs.org/en/download/), install nodejs, and in windows set PATH variable. Then ```python > mkdir dapp > cd dapp > npm init > touch app.js > npm install express --save # instead of index.js --> app.js > npm install ejs --save > npm install nodemon # restarts server after each saved change > mkdir views > mkdir views/partials > mkdir public > mkdir public/css > mkdir public/js > mkdir public/img ```
